1.0.name: wordpress/charityemail-sign-up-widget
1.0.description: Add this widget to your site to allow your visitors to sign up to your e-newsletter and email marketing campaigns, sent using the CharityeMail email marketing system. The email address of your new subscriber will be added to the CharityeMail Address Book you specify within your Settings in Wordpress. If you're not already a CharityeMail user you can find out more about CharityeMail at http://www.charityemail.co.uk.
